short_description: Our Services What we do: Europe CE Marking The CE mark indicates that your product is in compliance with the European product legislation.
long_description: Our Services What we do: Europe CE Marking The CE mark indicates that your product is in compliance with the European product legislation. Our team of experts can determine which QMS is necessary for your organisation in relation to your products and or services within your industry of choice and then guide you through this process.
